mapper.select:
select ri.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ri.medicine_photo_resource_key , ri.location_address , ri.medicine_dosage , ui.last_login_date , ri.diet_recipe_id , ui.phone_number , ri.description , ri.location_longitude , ui.registration_date , ri.reminder_item_id , ri.title , ri.reminder_time , ri.is_completed , ri.location_latitude , ui.password , ri.creation_time , ri.update_time , ri.reminder_type_enum_id , ui.username
,medicine_photo.resource_id as medicine_photo_resource_id ,medicine_photo.resource_name as medicine_photo_resource_name ,medicine_photo.resource_path as medicine_photo_resource_path ,medicine_photo.related_table_name as medicine_photo_related_table_name ,medicine_photo.related_table_key as medicine_photo_related_table_key ,medicine_photo.relate_table_column_name as medicine_photo_relate_table_column_name
FROM reminder_item ri left join user_info ui on ri.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='reminder_item' and relate_table_column_name='medicine_photo' ) as medicine_photo on medicine_photo.related_table_key=ri.reminder_item_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ri.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ri.medicine_photo_resource_key , ri.location_address , ri.medicine_dosage , ui.last_login_date , ri.diet_recipe_id , ui.phone_number , ri.description , ri.location_longitude , ui.registration_date , ri.reminder_item_id , ri.title , ri.reminder_time , ri.is_completed , ri.location_latitude , ui.password , ri.creation_time , ri.update_time , ri.reminder_type_enum_id , ui.username
,medicine_photo.resource_id as medicine_photo_resource_id ,medicine_photo.resource_name as medicine_photo_resource_name ,medicine_photo.resource_path as medicine_photo_resource_path ,medicine_photo.related_table_name as medicine_photo_related_table_name ,medicine_photo.related_table_key as medicine_photo_related_table_key ,medicine_photo.relate_table_column_name as medicine_photo_relate_table_column_name
FROM reminder_item ri left join user_info ui on ri.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='reminder_item' and relate_table_column_name='medicine_photo' ) as medicine_photo on medicine_photo.related_table_key=ri.reminder_item_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ri.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ri.medicine_photo_resource_key , ri.location_address , ri.medicine_dosage , ui.last_login_date , ri.diet_recipe_id , ui.phone_number , ri.description , ri.location_longitude , ui.registration_date , ri.reminder_item_id , ri.title , ri.reminder_time , ri.is_completed , ri.location_latitude , ui.password , ri.creation_time , ri.update_time , ri.reminder_type_enum_id , ui.username
,medicine_photo.resource_id as medicine_photo_resource_id ,medicine_photo.resource_name as medicine_photo_resource_name ,medicine_photo.resource_path as medicine_photo_resource_path ,medicine_photo.related_table_name as medicine_photo_related_table_name ,medicine_photo.related_table_key as medicine_photo_related_table_key ,medicine_photo.relate_table_column_name as medicine_photo_relate_table_column_name
FROM reminder_item ri left join user_info ui on ri.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='reminder_item' and relate_table_column_name='medicine_photo' ) as medicine_photo on medicine_photo.related_table_key=ri.reminder_item_id
where ri.reminder_item_id = #{id}
